text: Villa del Rosario is a city in the center of the province of Córdoba, Argentina. It has 13,741 inhabitants as per the , and is the head town of the Río Segundo Department. It is located 80 km east-southeast from the provincial capital Córdoba, on the right-hand (southern) banks of the Segundo River (also known as Xanaes). On December 2, 2013, much of the city was destroyed in a powerful tornado. ==References== * * Portal de Villa del Rosario — City portal. Category:Populated places in Córdoba Province, Argentina
title: Villa del Rosario, Córdoba
